ComicInfo.Summary:
Agent 007 is a loner, by nature. But finally, he accepts that he needs help. But will trusting someone else help his mission...or lead to the deaths of innocents?
By VITA AYALA (Morbius, Gamora), DANNY LORE (Queen Of Bad Dreams) and ERICA D'URSO (Captain Marvel).
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Afua Richardson | 1 | B/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Afua Richardson | 2 | C/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Afua Richardson | 3 | D/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Vintage Paperback Homage" Edition Variant Cover | Afua Richardson | 4 | E/LE | Limited Edition "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Afua Richardson | 5 | F/FOC | 1:11 FOC Bonus Incentive "Tinted" Edition Variant Cover | Afua Richardson | 6 | G/FOC | 1:15 FOC Bonus Incentive "Virgin Tinted" Edition Variant Cover | Afua Richardson | 7 |
